name: The Ghostsweeper (Steven Leavengood)
description:
Global Game Jam 2021 entry - https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/ghostsweeper-4

Gary the Ghostbuster owns his own house cleaning company and gets a call to clean a mansion. He works alone because he likes to work alone. Upon arriving at the mansion, he starts cleaning, and passes out. When he wakes up, he realizes he can see ghosts. The ghosts cannot pass on without getting what they lost in life. Gary takes it upon himself to help out the Ghosts thinking he is only in a dream and thinks he can wake up by helping the ghosts. - CONTROLS - WASD - Movement Left Mouse Button - Vacuum Suction * STORY SPOILERS * After finally helping all of the ghosts, Gary comes to the realization that, he too, has passed away. And to pass on he must defeat the demon that holds their souls to this plane.
